meanings.definition: Give new energy or strength to.
meanings.sent1: A good night's sleep reinvigorates the body and mind.
meanings.sent2: Exercising regularly reinvigorates your muscles and improves your overall health.
meanings.sent3: The fresh cup of coffee reinvigorates the tired office workers during their afternoon slump.
meanings.sent4: The inspiring speech reinvigorates the team, motivating them to work towards their goals with renewed vigor.
meanings.sent5: The sight of blooming flowers reinvigorates the spirit, bringing a sense of renewal and vitality.

meanings.definition: Make (someone) feel strong, healthy, and full of energy again.
meanings.sent1: A warm hug from a loved one reinvigorates the soul and brings comfort.
meanings.sent2: Spending time in nature reinvigorates the mind and rejuvenates the spirit.
meanings.sent3: The delicious meal reinvigorates the hungry traveler, filling them with joy and satisfaction.
meanings.sent4: The laughter of children reinvigorates the atmosphere, spreading happiness and positivity.
meanings.sent5: Listening to uplifting music reinvigorates the mood, lifting the spirits and energizing the body.
